item.title: Acoustic Punk Rock playlist for 12/2013
item.description: Including: Alkaline Trio, Anti-Flag, Carlos And The Jackal, Chuck Ragan, Dave Hause, Dropkick Murphy'S, Have Nots, Northcote, The Flatliners, The Penske File, Tim Barry.

item.title: Acoustic Punk Rock playlist for 11/2013
item.description: Including: Against Me!, Andrew Jackson Jihad, Chuck Ragan, Dead End Days, Mixtapes, Ramshackle Glory, Rise Against, Social Distortion, The Front Bottoms, The Get Up Kids.

item.title: Acoustic Punk Rock playlist for 10/2013
item.description: Including: Allison Weiss, Arroyo Deathmatch, Dave Hause, Gaslight Anthem, Random Orbits, Sheldon Vance, Strike Anywhere, The Gaslight Anthem, The Menzingers, The Smith Street Band.

item.title: Acoustic Punk Rock playlist for 9/2013

item.description: Including: Against Me!, Chuck Ragan, Dave Hause, Dave Hause (& Jack), Johnny Two Bags, Kleinholz, Laura Jane Grace, Mikey Erg!, Tim Vantol, Wingnut Dishwashers Union.
